
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52658230">
熟悉注册表的同仁应该，随着使用电脑时间的增长，电脑在刚刚安装的时候没安装什么软件，<br>
电脑的鼠标右键很清爽，用过一段时间后，随着各类软件的安装，各个应用软件在安装的时候<br>
都会向右键中写入各式各样的菜单，有些时候想手动删除又不知道菜单在注册表中的什么位置<br>
我把常用的菜单都列举了出来，熟悉注册表的可以自己按照自己的使用习惯来增加<br>
把以下内容保存为批处理文件运行即可，不要问什么是批处理文件，没时间作科普<br>
有动手能力自己弄<br>
@echo off<br>
REM 检查是否为管理员<br>
net session &gt;nul 2&gt;&amp;1<br>
if %errorLevel% neq 0 (<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; echo 正在请求管理员权限...<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; powershell -Command "Start-Process cmd.exe -ArgumentList '/c \"%~f0\"' -Verb RunAs"<br>
&nbsp; &nbsp; exit /b<br>
)<br>
REM 以下是需要管理员权限的代码<br>
<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "鼠标右键菜单管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "shell32.dll,34" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /v "Position" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "Center" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /v "SubCommands" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\All" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "所有文件右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\All" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "shell32.dll,34" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\All" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\All\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\*\shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\CommandStore" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "CommandStore管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\CommandStore" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "shell32.dll,34" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\CommandStore" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\CommandStore\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\CommandStore\shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\ControlPanel" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "控制面板图标管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\ControlPanel" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "control.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\ControlPanel" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\ControlPanel\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\ControlPanel\NameSpace\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\desktop" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "桌面图标管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\desktop" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "shell32.dll,34" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\desktop" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\desktop\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Desktop\NameSpace\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\DesktopBackground" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "DesktopBackground右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\DesktopBackground" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "C:\Windows\System32\shell32.dll,3" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\DesktopBackground" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\DesktopBackground\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\DesktopBackground\Shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Directory" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "文件夹右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Directory" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "C:\Windows\System32\shell32.dll,3" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Directory" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Directory\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\Directory\shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Drive" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "驱动器右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Drive" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "C:\Windows\System32\shell32.dll,8" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Drive" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\Drive\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\Drive\shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\MyComputer" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "资源管理器图标管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\MyComputer" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "shell32.dll,34" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\MyComputer" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\MyComputer\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\MyComputer\NameSpace\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\PC" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "我的电脑右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\PC" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "C:\Windows\System32\imageres.dll,-109" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\PC" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\PC\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\CLSID\{20D04FE0-3AEA-1069-A2D8-08002B30309D}\shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\RenamesYJ" /v "Muiverb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "本菜单整理(&amp;M)" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\RenamesYJ" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\RenamesYJ" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "%%WINDIR%%\\system32\Shell32.dll,-16784" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\RenamesYJ\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\wslj" /v "MuiVerb" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "网上邻居右键管理" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\wslj" /v "Icon" /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "C:\Windows\System32\imageres.dll,-25" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\wslj" /v "CommandFlags" /t REG_DWORD /d "32" /f<br>
REG ADD "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu\Shell\wslj\Command" /ve /t REG_EXPAND_SZ /d "cmd /c REG ADD \"HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Applets\Regedit\" /v \"LastKey\" /t REG_SZ /d \"HKCR\CLSID\{F02C1A0D-BE21-4350-88B0-7367FC96EF3C}\Shell\" /F&gt;NUL&amp;regedit.exe|taskkill /F /IM cmd.exe" /f<br>
rem reg delete "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /f 要删除的话把前面的rem去年复制到cmd中执行即可。<br>
<br>
Exit<br>
<br>
<br>
删除右键代码,复制到cmd中执行即可<br>
reg delete "HKCR\Directory\Background\shell\Right_Menu" /f<br>
<br>
附蓝奏链接&nbsp;&nbsp;<font style="color:rgb(63, 63, 63)"><font style="background-color:rgb(194, 236, 178)"><font face="Arial, 微软雅黑, 宋体, 新宋体, sans-serif">https://baolizhu.lanzouu.com/iZ0wc2r10dpe</font></font></font><br>

<br>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
